SINGLE_60_0_1_GACHA_10.name: Command: Reconstruction Ten-roll Headhunting Permit
SINGLE_60_0_1_GACHA_10.usage: A batch headhunting permit issued by the Rhodes Island HR Department; Can be used at a certain time to recruit talented Operators, 10 rolls at once.

SOCIAL_PT.description: Credit holds communities together and stands as a symbol of social stability. Sometimes it's even more valuable than money, so do please cherish it.
SOCIAL_PT.name: Credit
SOCIAL_PT.usage: A token of friendship. Can be used to exchange items from the Store.

STORY_REVIEW_COIN.description:
An auxiliary function of Rhodes Island's intelligence processing system. After extracting effective intelligence from a complex batch of information, the system was able to recreate images of past events with astonishing fidelity.
The information was packaged as videotapes to make it easier for ordinary people to understand.
STORY_REVIEW_COIN.name: Information Fragments
STORY_REVIEW_COIN.usage: A topological model of effective intelligence that can be used to reconstruct past events.

act10d5_token_biscuit.description:
Snack bags usually are not a very effective way to preserve the integrity of their contents, so it's hard to find one with a complete cookie inside.
Though a bit fragmented, the overall appearance is cute enough, and the flavor is still uncompromised.
act10d5_token_biscuit.name: Best-selling Peterheim Cookies
act10d5_token_biscuit.usage: Sold exclusively at Peterheim Middle School and all the rage among students, can be exchanged for various supplies.

act10mini_token_ticket.description: Vouchers with no worth anywhere outside of Caladon. These roughly printed vouchers prop up the lives of everyone in the Infected community.
act10mini_token_ticket.name: Wage Ticket
act10mini_token_ticket.usage: Vouchers for material supplies issued by Caladon City to its Infected workers. Can purchase a multitude of goods at thrift shops that the government will not provide.

act11d0_token_currency.description: The original owners of these antique coin have long departed from this remote land. However, the descendants of these decorated nobles still demanded Wolumonde's respect, and thus they passed into law the ability to circulate these coins for the purpose of satisfying their vanity.
act11d0_token_currency.name: Aristocrat's Antique Aureus
act11d0_token_currency.usage: An antique currency that is still in circulation in Wolumonde; Can be used to exchange for rewards at the August Fair.

act11d0_token_warrant.description: Grip this document within your hands as if the distinctive laws of Leithanien never wavered. But, this illusion has long been shattered by the tragedy unfolding before your eyes in Wolumonde - delve deep into the mines, woods, and unclaimed vales, and bring justice to the perpetrators.
act11d0_token_warrant.name: Wolumonde Search Warrant
act11d0_token_warrant.usage: A warrant issued by Wolumonde's Gendarmerie, authorizing entry into occupied zones to hunt down ruffians who fled amidst the chaos.

act11mini_token_card.description: With this library card, you can read any story that piques your interest. No matter what events may ensue, the time that you spend will all be recorded.
act11mini_token_card.name: Library Card
act11mini_token_card.usage: A library card independently issued by the private library. Can be used to read any material, however no items may be removed from the premises.

act12d0_token_components.description: Originally seen only in Zumama's tribe, these eventually scattered throughout various places in the rainforests and wilds. Each one seems imaginative to the point of defying the laws of physics, but falls short of the industrial standards of any country.
act12d0_token_components.name: Mechanical Parts
act12d0_token_components.usage: Widely-used mechanical parts in Zumama's tribe, can be exchanged for various supplies.

act12d6_token_mushroom.description: Allows you to blur the boundary between fact and fiction, seeing things that you could not see before. Of course, this is the culprit behind your adventures.
act12d6_token_mushroom.name: Magnificent Mushroom
act12d6_token_mushroom.usage: These psychadelic-looking mushrooms exuding brilliant colors can enhance the performance of the Limbic System.

act12d6_token_pancake.description: Ceobe's favorite food. She is willing to part with anything in exchange for these.
act12d6_token_pancake.name: Delicious Honey Biscuit
act12d6_token_pancake.usage: A traditional Minosian food made from starch and fructose. Used to obtain rewards from the Honey Biscuit Castle.

act12mini_token_component.description: The fast rusting remains of war ambitions, Knightclub knockouts, or perhaps damaged weapon parts. Poses a risk of Originium infection if not handled properly. For some strange reason, occasionally found in common working-class households.
act12mini_token_component.name: Standard-Issue Component
act12mini_token_component.usage: A type of worn-out mechanical part commonly found around Dzwonek, recyclable at city supermarkets across Kazimierz.

act12side_point_cmemomedal.description: Every medal represents Ch'en's swift mid-investigation resolution of incidents unrelated to her assignment from Ms. Candela. During the time she was retained in Dossoles, the city's crime rate reached a record low. As a warning for the local police department, these Ch'en medals have been displayed in the middle of the head office, where you can't miss them.
act12side_point_cmemomedal.name: Miss Ch'en Commemorative Medal
act12side_point_cmemomedal.usage: Medals specially ordered by Ms. Candela to be cast to commend Ch'en's actions. Accumulate certain amounts and the Dossoles Police Station will issue rewards.

act12side_token_coupon.description: Mama John's of Columbia has been offering industrial assembly-line products for all trades, all walks and all rhythms of life in a capacity Bolvar's native industry can't compare to, to the extent that all these vouchers, originally simply issued to promote sales, have become more and more truly valuable. At times, they even serve as the currency for dealings between local small-time gangs.
act12side_token_coupon.name: Mama John's Voucher
act12side_token_coupon.usage: Vouchers redeemable at all Mama John's in Dossoles.

act12side_token_key01.description: At the time, Hoshiguma and Swire weren't aware of how they'd handily sorted out Ch'en's objective. The only reason they never ran into her was because Swire immediately dragged Hoshiguma off to go shopping.
act12side_token_key01.name: [Oni and Tiger Twinned Stars]
act12side_token_key01.usage: A commemoration of Ch'en's special investigation in Dossoles.

act12side_token_key02.description: That day, that moment Ch'en and Lin Yhsia came out of the A.H.C. Bar, the gunpowder tension between them had everyone following the championship excited beyond belief.
act12side_token_key02.name: [Dragon and Rat in Conflict]
act12side_token_key02.usage: A commemoration of Ch'en's special investigation in Dossoles.

act12side_token_key03.description: In Swire's belief, she needs a partner just as Hoshiguma is to Ch'en, and simultaneously, she believes Lin Yhsia could become that partner. She's made no small effort to see that happen, and ultimately, you can tell how it turned out just by the look on their faces.
act12side_token_key03.name: ['Golden Partner']
act12side_token_key03.usage: A commemoration of Ch'en's special investigation in Dossoles.

act12side_token_key04.description: Though when she set off to return to Rhodes Island, Ch'en didn't fully understand the city of Dossoles, neither does she believe there'll come a day she truly does. That said, she'll always remember this place.
act12side_token_key04.name: [Holiday's End]
act12side_token_key04.usage: A commemoration of Ch'en's special investigation in Dossoles.

act13d0_token_dial.description: A once treasured clock, now reduced to nothing more than a broken dial with some small value only to collectors. You find things like this in abandoned houses. A clock silently keeping the time can be priceless, or worthless. The hour hand on the dial is stuck in place, vainly trying to turn.
act13d0_token_dial.name: Discarded Clock Dial
act13d0_token_dial.usage: An old, broken piece of a clock that can be exchanged for supplies at the weekend yard sale. Someone will want it.

act13d5_token_securities.description: A couple blond Fortes are selling gold pieces of paper at three times the stated price. This voucher can be used to buy aid packages for competition knights in the arena, or as a bankroll to bet on, but be prepared to pay more than the number printed on it. A piece of paper, a huge sum, a knight's life of honor and shame.
act13d5_token_securities.name: Mieszko Sports Securities
act13d5_token_securities.usage: A new securitized holding launched by the Mieszko Group that allows you to buy souvenirs at a Kazimierz duty free shop.

act13mini_token_can.description:
This weekend, the L.G.D. is joining hands with our local stray animal shelters to hold an adoption drive. We hope all our friends in the city able to adopt will jump at the opportunity to give these homeless little ones a chance at a brand new life.
Of course, those who aren't in a position to adopt can still contribute by offering cans of pet food, not to mention the splendid gifts awaiting anyone who donates.
act13mini_token_can.name: Nutritional Pet Food Tin
act13mini_token_can.usage: A tin of pet food common to the Lungmen market, cheap and delicious. Just give the ring pull a flick, and you'll have your little dear bounding over to you.

act13side_token_card.description: Within this building of money and power, the tired form of your face serves absolutely no use, vocalizations and brain-thoughts all the more insignificant. In here, only status matters.
act13side_token_card.name: General Chamber ID Card
act13side_token_card.usage: An ID card granting free access in the General Chamber of Commerce, signaling greater privileges to be open to Rhodes Island.

act13side_token_key.description: The file manager in the darkness has another duty: to cleverly let 'secrets' be found by those in the know. The Adeptus Sprawiedliwi have never given up their control of Kazimierzwhether good or ill.
act13side_token_key.name: File Manager's Key
act13side_token_key.usage: A key that can open the underground gate of the Wall of Champions exhibit hall, unlocking some additional information.

act13side_token_model.description: The people use these shining fluorescent lamps to subdue nightfall, such is the light of Kazimierz. In civilized lands, traveling bards sing of gold, wandering knights forced to battle sword with glass. Indifferent are the silent waves; on this small, final vessel, she dredged up glory.
act13side_token_model.name: G.K.T. Commemorative Model
act13side_token_model.usage: A scale miniature of the Land of the Knights, often elaborately laid out in the decorative cases of parlors.

act14mini_token_fu.description: A wellbeing charm hand-carved by the Moushan villagers to pray for blessings. Take it to Yishan Temple, have the censer acolyte bestow it a stroke of cinnabar, and it may put you all the more at ease.
act14mini_token_fu.name: Wellbeing Charm
act14mini_token_fu.usage: A plaque carved of crude peachwood. When a year's harvest is good, some are willing to exchange their foodstuffs with the elderly, whose consummate craft produces these charms, by which auspiciousness is sought.

act14side_token_stone.description: Kjeragandr's will dwells within. Kjerag's people pray to these, to be blessed and for good health.
act14side_token_stone.name: Stone of Kjeragandr
act14side_token_stone.usage: A sacred stone blessed by a member of the Vine-Bead Court. Collect a certain amount to exchange with the people for goods.

act15d0_token_ironSheet.description: You can make them during factory work hours, but it's no easy thing to sneak them off. They work as weapons as well as currency, and act as one measure of status in the prison.
act15d0_token_ironSheet.name: Factory Steel
act15d0_token_ironSheet.usage: A currency universally recognized amongst the prisoners. Can be used through secret channels to obtain what you want.

act15d5_token_postcard.description: Landscape postcards independently published by the people all over, known for their distinct and bold framing, all using photos chosen from personal submissions, with some small fame among a subset of collectors. Different stories take root in different lands, and the scenery is always there to tell without a word.
act15d5_token_postcard.name: Wondrous Postcard
act15d5_token_postcard.usage: Postcards printed with unique landscapes from every part, allowing a taste of all their sceneries without having to set foot outside. Can be used to exchange for goods with the staff of branch offices everywhere.

act15mini_token_figurine.description: So that others may more easily find supplies hidden in the forest, the hunters have made simple waymarkers. Be sure to restock some too after you avail of them, for the trees know all.
act15mini_token_figurine.name: Guiding Figurines
act15mini_token_figurine.usage: A crude carving left behind by the hunters. Wooden figures with indistinct features reach forth an arm, pointing to caves stockpiled with food, remedies, and tools.

act15side_token_tea.description: Diligent workers step hurriedly, easy-to-carry jarred tea there in times of need. The tea is chosen with care, pure in color and scent, flavor sweet and light and long-lasting, aftertaste melodious. Numerous brands exist, standing their own ground in drinks sections of supermarkets in every region of Yan, save for Zhe'ergen Signature, which no one pays any mind.
act15side_token_tea.name: Canned Tea
act15side_token_tea.usage: A specialty jarred beverage common in Shangshu. They say it always sells out at inns and teahouses.

act16d5_token_inker.description: On its front, 'starshrouded snow' is engraved in characters from ancient times. Just the talent to create these inksticks can be called rare. Dusk very rarely uses normal inksticks. If she's out of options, employing one to depict one and retrieving one fresh isn't impossible either.
act16d5_token_inker.name: Dusk Inkstick
act16d5_token_inker.usage: Dusk's handmade inkstick. Nobody knows how they're made. Perhaps you can make use of them to ask her about a few things.

act16mini_token_sap.description: Bottletree sap naturally fermented in the abdomens of tree-hanging Originium slugs, celebrated by man and adored by sandbeasts. Still, how the beasts get the sap when they can't climb trees is one of Rim Billiton's great mysteries. Are there feral barreners helping them? Can't be...
act16mini_token_sap.name: Spicy Bottletree Sap
act16mini_token_sap.usage: Extremely spicy and fantastically invigorating, with a deep velvet flavor fresh bottletree sap can't hope to match. And the upside of not chronically ruining your body like hard liquor would. Give it to wild sandbeasts, and you might end up trading for their stashed curios.

act16side_token_bolt.description: The collectability of a bullet depends on its caliber size. As to why an empty shell can be traded for goods in a dessert shopYou must understand that, as the most popular destination among locals, Lateranian Desserts has always been more than just a dessert shop.
act16side_token_bolt.name: Etched Bullet Casing
act16side_token_bolt.usage: A collectible somewhat popular among Laterans. Collect enough to exchange with the dessert shop owner for goods.

act17d0_token_form.description: The certificate bears the signature of the administrator, an anti-counterfeiting watermark, and a detailed record of the supplies needed by the operators and for what reasons they are needed. After these three items have been verified, the responsible personnel will collect the voucher attached to the certificate and distribute the supplies to the field operator.
act17d0_token_form.name: Rhodes Island Resource Allocation Certificate
act17d0_token_form.usage: Rationing certificates issued by Rhodes Island to field operators, including vouchers. Can be used to exchange for supplies in Rhodes Island's landship, regional branches, and various safehouses.

act17mini_token_ash.description: A large piece of slag that was ejected from the Soul Furnace for unknown reasons, which shattered into pieces when bombarded by the airship. It contains trace amounts of Originium and Oriron, but extraction is extremely difficult.
act17mini_token_ash.name: Slag
act17mini_token_ash.usage: Fireworks pieces that fell from the sky. The custodian of a certain furnace node is looking for it, but what you get in return for it seems to differ from person to person.

act17side_token_compass.description: The Iberians of times past guided their course by compass, the needle bearing the weight of their wild ambitions and golden dreams. Naught but ravings nowadays; the needle is broken, the brass is tarnished, and none know the dreadnought's end, bar the silent sea.
act17side_token_compass.name: Rusted Compass
act17side_token_compass.usage: All attempts to tread unto the sea have been vain and futile. Where the compass points is certain to be anguished, turbid, and sunken.

act18d0_token_page.description: Mineral, flora, fauna, cities; vestiges of life, and even symbols of civilization. In the meanders of this time overflowing with Originium, countless things fade from Terra's boundless history of organic evolution. Disasters unfold unabatingly, and even the grandest cities all disappear in the end. But there will always be people to record it all. She will come in her slow walk with time.
act18d0_token_page.name: Scattered Sketches
act18d0_token_page.usage: Specimen sketches scattered all over the ground in a great gale. If you help tidy them up, you can earn some supplies.

act18d3_token_record.description: The urge to accept it comes from a craving that knows no name.
act18d3_token_record.name: Corrupted Iberian Record
act18d3_token_record.usage: Records already ravaged beyond playability. Can be exchanged with the long-time residents of the ruins for goods.

act18mini_token_petals.description: A shattered yet still brilliant crystal shaped like a petal, often seen among death-blackened scorched earth. They are ripples left behind by traveling Canoes, engraved with the final memories and emotions of those who passed away.
act18mini_token_petals.name: Broken Petals
act18mini_token_petals.usage: A crystal of blood left behind in the battlefield ruins. It is said that if you place it in a deserted nook where roses bloom, when the twin moons are at their brightest, the fortunate will find some unexpected presents waiting for them come daybreak.

act18side_token_pieces.description: The notes scribbled on the staff are jumbled and disorderly. Only the composer himself can, at a glance, make out the soul hidden therein.
act18side_token_pieces.name: Sheet Music
act18side_token_pieces.usage: Musicians often misplace their drafts during outbursts of emotion. If you straighten it out and return it to its owner, perhaps you will receive a new piece in return.

act19mini_token_sweetie.description: A small object on the cusp of becoming a geist, taking advantage of humanity's inattention to trundle about. Pranks on the street corner, odd sounds from the depths of stoves... A strange air permeates the town.
act19mini_token_sweetie.name: 'Sweetie'
act19mini_token_sweetie.usage: If you bring lost geists that have not yet transformed to Mr. Pu's place, he will give you a few interesting trinkets in return as thanks. You notice the things he previously collected all have their own names.

act19side_token_reagents.description: Very sensitive to neural activity, and can replace some of the functions of traditional Arts Units. In the Rhine Lab Defense Section's laboratory supplies management handbook, this test reagent's hazard and confidentiality levels are both listed at maximum.
act19side_token_reagents.name: Mysterious Reagent
act19side_token_reagents.usage: The latest innovation of Rhine Lab's Energy Section. Collect enough and exchange with the Laboratory Recycling Depot for goods.

act1arcade_milestone_point.description: The cards might be small, but get enough of them and you can trade them in for big prizes!
act1arcade_milestone_point.name: Point Card
act1arcade_milestone_point.usage: A reward for first clearing stages which can be used to buy prizes at the Exchange Counter; subsequent reclears will not reward more.

act1bossrush_milestone_point.description: Right and wrong are far from crucial in a simulation. They are only a form of support. They help you make the correct choices when the battle is real.
act1bossrush_milestone_point.name: Trial EXP
act1bossrush_milestone_point.usage: Experience gained from finished trials. Upgrades trial levels.

act1bossrush_token_relic.description: An encrypted data block. Always remember, the conversion of information often entails unavoidable wear. Make good use of your information storage devices, but do not depend on them.
act1bossrush_token_relic.name: Data Blackbox
act1bossrush_token_relic.usage: Used to perform Data Iteration on Limiter Units.

act1break_milestone_point.description: An ordinary floor sign. After being used to denote acceleration points in stool racing competitions, operators interested in these competitions have become rather fond of it, eventually turning it into a collectible.
act1break_milestone_point.name: 'Caution! Wet Floor!'
act1break_milestone_point.usage: Can be exchanged at Breakthrough Milestones for rewards.

act1collection_point_token.description: Rhodes Island issues special reward points as an incentive to field operators dispatched to the base building operation in Szubat-Arsalan. These points can be used to redeem important supplies.
act1collection_point_token.name: 'Expeditioners' Redemption Point
act1collection_point_token.usage: Can be exchanged for the corresponding event stage reward.

act1enemyduel_milestone_point.description: Apparently, using it can send a fullscreen fireworks effect along with a message to the entire Duel Channel. But what the richie-riches who break the TOS to spam them in public chat all day might not know is that they can be blocked with a click of a button on the website.
act1enemyduel_milestone_point.name: Grand Duel Fireworks
act1enemyduel_milestone_point.usage: One of the more expensive Duel Channel gifts, and can be exchanged on the website for material rewards, with free shipping and home delivery.

act1lock_point_reward.description: Points gained for taking down OpFor troops, awarded to competitors in the form of medals. Owing to it being forged by Minos smiths, in each medal's engraving is the proverb 'all heroes arise from normal people.'
act1lock_point_reward.name: Competition Medals
act1lock_point_reward.usage: A small medal made from metal. Gain certain amounts and receive corresponding competition rewards.

act1mainlinebp_token_star.description: A flickering, glinting fragment. A light so that you no longer fear the dark as you walk dauntlessly on through the thorns.
act1mainlinebp_token_star.name: Milestone Fragment
act1mainlinebp_token_star.usage: Can be exchanged for Milestone Rewards.

act1mainss_token_medi.description: WARNING: For best results, administer via peripheral IV. In case of first-aid, can attempt via CVC. If shock ensues after first dose, second IV may be administered within 5-7 minutes (repeat dose). EACH DOSE COULD BE THE KEY TO SAVING A LIFE IN THE FIELD. MAKE GOOD USE OF THEM.
act1mainss_token_medi.name: Emergency Inhibitor
act1mainss_token_medi.usage: A new formulation from Rhodes Island's Medical R&D, capable of temporarily suppressing the exacerbation of Oripathy in Catastrophe- or battlefield-level Originium zones. THIS DRUG PLACES IMMENSE STRAIN ON THE BODY. USE WITH CAUTION.

act1multi_token_cap.description: A certificate of participation in Rhodes Island's Icebreaker Games. 'Leave your sweat in the stadium. Come home with camaraderie.'
act1multi_token_cap.name: Participation Certificate - S1
act1multi_token_cap.usage: As you collect Participation Certificates, so does Hype. Reach certain Hype levels to receive rewards.

act1sandbox_milestone_point.description: Life prospers, age passes down to age, and this is their proof.
act1sandbox_milestone_point.name: Badge of Prosperity
act1sandbox_milestone_point.usage: Can be exchanged at milestones for rewards.

act1vautochess_token_chess.description: Medals prepared by Rhodes Island's workshop for operators participating in Stronghold Protocol. Magnetic. Apparently, if you gather enough of them, you can make a fortress out of chess pieces.
act1vautochess_token_chess.name: Stronghold Credits
act1vautochess_token_chess.usage: Can be exchanged for all sorts of supplies in Stronghold Protocol.

act1vecb_milestone_point.description: Special memorabilia of Rhodes Island Engineering Department make. Apparently, the Engineering op who designed it took inspiration from a board game that's been all the rage at Rhodes Island.
act1vecb_milestone_point.name: Attainment Point
act1vecb_milestone_point.usage: Can be exchanged at Breakthrough Milestones for rewards.

act20side_token_book.description: The pages retain handwriting of all shapes and sizes, the amount even serving to tell you how often the magazine's changed hands. Most of it is meaningless scrawls, but flashes of wisdom are scattered throughout.
act20side_token_book.name: Photocopies of 'Stranger Things'
act20side_token_book.usage: Photocopies of a gaudy magazine, the contents preposterous, yet well-loved by Durin far and wide. Can be used at the Leaping Gloompincer Market to trade with the Durin for supplies.

act21side_token_permesso.description: Steaks, seasonal vegetables, and fresh fruit to please any soul, or a little something otherwise. The clever ones know what the famiglie want, and will ready it in advance, to be supplied when the time comes.
act21side_token_permesso.name: Permesso di Importazione
act21side_token_permesso.usage: Permits issued by the Dipartimento di Sicurezza Alimentare to the famiglie. These grant famiglia members entry to the Dipartimento di Sicurezza Alimentare and the right to obtain goods, whether said goods fall under 'alimentare' notwithstanding.

act22side_token_manuscript.description: Few who know these folksongs are able to put them in writing, while those who pen Taran history wouldn't go out of their way to listen. But there'll always be people devoted to compiling the scattered culture of Tara, say the merchants, and it's a business that's gone on for several centuries.
act22side_token_manuscript.name: Manuscripts of Ballads
act22side_token_manuscript.usage: Pages filled with Taran folksongs and legends, copied down as heard. Collect enough, and you'll be able to trade them with the River Valley Caravan for goods.

act23side_token_spirit.description: A Yumen specialty product, high-purity spirit. Beloved by all drinkers, brewed by all brewers. A brew mixed of sandstorms on the border, and sun beating down in the sky and wind on the poplars, one gulp is a throat of blades and a drink of fire, and even the chilliest nights need no longer be feared.
act23side_token_spirit.name: Freshly-Brewed Liedaozi
act23side_token_spirit.usage: Take a jar of freshly brewed spirit, and trade it with the old smith for a newly-edged sword of fine craft. 'Blood for water, wine for a blade. A close friend crossed by, grace and vengeance all too willing.'

act24side_melding_1.description: Shattered bone fragments found in the barrens, weathered by wind for years. Their original, complete form can no longer be identified. Perhaps they once belonged to some great beast, but now they are nothing but low-grade materials that can be found anywhere.
act24side_melding_1.name: Bone Fragments
act24side_melding_1.usage: A common low-grade material usable in Alchemy.

act24side_melding_2.description: The hard outer shell of an Originium Slug covered in tiny clusters of Originium. Tastes slightly bitter when licked. Even though there are many types of Originium Slugs out there, the quality of the materials they yield doesn't vary much at all.
act24side_melding_2.name: Originium Slug Shell
act24side_melding_2.usage: A regular material usable in Alchemy, obtainable by putting in just a little bit of work.

act24side_melding_3.description: The sharp fangs of an Oxmane, so sharp that they can tear apart flesh with ease. They serve as an excellent Alchemy material. As a reminder, they must not be used in place of dentures.
act24side_melding_3.name: Sharp Oxmane Fangs
act24side_melding_3.usage: A fine material usable in Alchemy, obtainable by putting in a fair amount of work.

act24side_melding_4.description: The thick hide of Direswines, elastic and able to withstand great impact force. To obtain this material, one must first go through very intense battles. It takes lots of effort to get a taste of Direswine rind jelly.
act24side_melding_4.name: Thick Direswine Hide
act24side_melding_4.usage: A rare, high-grade material usable in Alchemy.

act24side_melding_5.description: A kind of crystal as clear as tears. Supposedly, they formed in the carcasses of a now extinct creature. When observed closely under light, you can even see the stars flow and circulate.
act24side_melding_5.name: 'Monster Tears'
act24side_melding_5.usage: An extremely rare, top-of-the-line material usable in Alchemy.

act24side_melding_6.description: A rare gem that occasionally grows in the wyvern's body. Hunters who are lucky enough to get their hands on them often find themselves hesitant when processing them.
act24side_melding_6.name: Rathalos Ruby
act24side_melding_6.usage: A material obtainable from battling a Rathalos. Perfect as melding material.

act25side_token_fdrchips.description: Aside from the data hidden by Nasti all over the lands, new data are continually produced with the federal government's support. Columbia is gradually realizing the value of Kristen's research.
act25side_token_fdrchips.name: Flight Data Recorder Chip
act25side_token_fdrchips.usage: A chip containing flight data recorded at various altitudes and environments. Collect a certain amount to exchange with the Special Case Contact C.U.D.O.D. for goods.

act25side_token_key01.description: Grants permission to enter the secret zone. The mechanisms within seem to work differently.
act25side_token_key01.name: Special Ops Permit
act25side_token_key01.usage: Grants permission to enter the secret zone. The mechanisms within seem to work differently.

act25side_token_key02.description: Grants permission to enter the secret zone. The mechanisms within seem to work differently.
act25side_token_key02.name: Special Ops Permit
act25side_token_key02.usage: Grants permission to enter the secret zone. The mechanisms within seem to work differently.

act26side_token_fragmenta.description: Holy Statue Fragments telling of all sorts of damage lie forgotten in every nook and cranny of the monastery, each shard unlike any other. These may never again piece together to form the complete image of a saint with a gun, but there are always those hanging onto hope.
act26side_token_fragmenta.name: Holy Statue Fragments
act26side_token_fragmenta.usage: Statues of saints bearing guns were once ornamental mainstays all over the monastery, but most are now nowhere to be seen. The monastery's devout followers are willing to barter what supplies they have in exchange for these fragments.

act27side_token_fur.description: Soft, insulating, and highly absorptive, it might look extremely delicious, but please don't start eating it like cotton candy.
act27side_token_fur.name: Fluffy Critter Wool
act27side_token_fur.usage: Looks good for padding outdoors thermal equipment, but seems to have little use in the current season. The young girl at 'White Volcano' has an inexplicable love for bizarre wool like this, and will surreptitiously trade you goods from the shop for it. N.B.: DO NOT let her big brother know!

act28side_token_box.description: Plastics, paper, wood... even scrapped Originium circuitry. Their only commonality is that they all burn when thrown in the power plant, and provide the plate with just that much more heat.
act28side_token_box.name: Shoddy Fuel
act28side_token_box.usage: Combustibles salvaged from Davistown and its environs. Practically worthless for heat, and produces way too much smoke, but fuel is fuel and there's an old worker by the energy tower who'll trade goods from the mine for it.

act29side_frag_1.description: Knock on the shut door and reach out. We should have been united through joy.
act29side_frag_1.name: Note of Joy
act29side_frag_1.usage: A piece of fallen memory, preserved with Arts. It pulses in your palm to the rhythm of emotion. It will be forged into a key before oblivion.

act29side_frag_2.description: Knock on the shut door and reach out. We should have been united through anger.
act29side_frag_2.name: Note of Anger
act29side_frag_2.usage: A piece of fallen memory, preserved with Arts. It pulses in your palm to the rhythm of emotion. It will be forged into a key before oblivion.

act29side_frag_3.description: Knock on the shut door and reach out. We should have been united through sorrow.
act29side_frag_3.name: Note of Sorrow
act29side_frag_3.usage: A piece of fallen memory, preserved with Arts. It pulses in your palm to the rhythm of emotion. It will be forged into a key before oblivion.

act29side_frag_4.description: Knock on the shut door and reach out. We should have been united through fear.
act29side_frag_4.name: Note of Fear
act29side_frag_4.usage: A piece of fallen memory, preserved with Arts. It pulses in your palm to the rhythm of emotion. It will be forged into a key before oblivion.

act29side_token_erin.description: Memories of the past are scattered across the ancient capital of Leithanien, carried by broken passages of music. Like today's Leithanien, they will need be tuned before they can be heard.
act29side_token_erin.name: Die Klnge von den Erinnerungen
act29side_token_erin.usage: Leaves that fall on the streets of Zwillingstrme. Missing phrases of music can be found on them from time to time. Give them to tune seekers at concerts and be rewarded with the gift of music.

act2bossrush_milestone_point.description: Right and wrong are far from crucial in a simulation. They are only a form of support. They help you make the correct choices when the battle is real.
act2bossrush_milestone_point.name: Trial EXP
act2bossrush_milestone_point.usage: Experience gained from finished trials. Upgrades trial levels.

act2bossrush_token_relic.description: An encrypted data block. Always remember, the conversion of information often entails unavoidable wear. Make good use of your information storage devices, but do not depend on them.
act2bossrush_token_relic.name: Data Blackbox
act2bossrush_token_relic.usage: Used to perform Data Iteration on Limiter Units.

act2collection_point_token.description: Rhodes Island issues special reward points as an incentive to field operators contributing to Integrated Strategies operations. These points can be used to redeem important supplies.
act2collection_point_token.name: 'Strategist' Point
act2collection_point_token.usage: Can be exchanged for the corresponding event stage reward.

act2mainss_token.description: To help calm the children anxious about leaving the landship, Raidian made these pin badges with paging and messaging functionalities, encouraging them to keep on smiling and stay in contact. After hearing about them, many operators asked her for some, recording words of encouragement on them before hiding them all over prior to the evacuation.
act2mainss_token.name: 'Courage' Badge
act2mainss_token.usage: Communicators made by Raidian in the shape of pin badges. Retrieving them can help reduce interference on the comms network, and they can be traded at Closure's for all sorts of supplies.

act2vmulti_token_cap.description: As you collect Mementos, so does Hype. Reach certain Hype levels to receive rewards.
act2vmulti_token_cap.name: Memento
act2vmulti_token_cap.usage: Leave your sweat in the stadium. Come home with camaraderie.

act30side_token_box.description:
Blind boxes from the cultural industries in collaboration with 'BangBang Burdenbeast.' Collect all nine, including a limited-edition secret burdenbeast.
NOTE: Pray faithfully to the newly erected Kjeragandr statue, and your odds of drawing the secret one go up!
act30side_token_box.name: Burdenbeast Blind Box
act30side_token_box.usage: Burdenbeast Blind Boxessuch a smash hit, Onboard Services ran out of stock for a time. That means this batch couldn't have come sooner, and the train attendants will be delighted to trade other goods for it.

act31side_token_box.description: The newest fruit borne of the Dahuang Tianshi Bureau's research. Simple to control, resiliently mobile. Sample-taking and soil monitoring are among its many functions. Naughty children occasionally make off with them to use in 'fowl fights.'
act31side_token_box.name: Sky Pole
act31side_token_box.usage: An agricultural drone developed by the Tianshi Bureaus, which people occasionally leave lying in the fields after they malfunction. If you pick any up, you can exchange them for goods at Shennong Market.

act32side_token_stamp.description: Upon seeing these cards, Tecno indifferently thumbs at a row of halved radishes in the corner of her workshop, each cross-section dyed through in seal ink and ready to go.
act32side_token_stamp.name: Galera Stamp Card
act32side_token_stamp.usage: A card for the Galera stamp rally. The more stamps, the more prizes you get. Despite each and every card bearing the limited-daily ultra-rare secret stamps, Reynell will still gladly exchange them for goods. In his words, 'my small token of respect to our anonymous seal-forger supreme.'

act33side_token_sugar.description: Crude sugar cubes of mechanized make, a Babel wartime supply ration. Provides soldiers with ample energy and a hint of sweetness.
act33side_token_sugar.name: Raw Sugar Lumps
act33side_token_sugar.usage: A 'hard currency' aboard Babel. Save up enough to spare, and the nice Vampire lady down by the Engineering Team will trade for some scarcities you'll appreciate.

act34side_token_chip.description: 'Emergency Supplies' Blueprint Chip that contains nearly a thousand ready-to-print blueprints, including survival necessities and equipment for experiments and creative activities. Do not neglect exploration and expression, no matter how dire the circumstances, for the stagnation of the mind and numbing of the spirit is akin to death.
act34side_token_chip.name: 'Emergency Supplies' Blueprint Chip
act34side_token_chip.usage: Microchip that holds a large number of blueprints, which can be printed at the Materianomicon Moderatrix.

act35side_token_dust.description: A tourist souvenir from the City of Radiance. It is said that artificers can turn them into large gemstones. 'A padishah once ordered all the gems accumulated in his palace over a thousand years to be ground into fine grains of sand and scattered at the bottom of the garden pond, just so that the citizens could share in the radiance.' - Exhibit label on a mummy in the museum
act35side_token_dust.name: Flowing Glimmerdust
act35side_token_dust.usage: Fine grains of gems that glitter like stars in the sky, older than the City of Radiance, and brighter than its hidden treasures.

act36side_token_recipe.description: A reminder for certain operators, especially Kay: The meals recommended in the cookbook are FULL meals! Stop asking if they're just snacks already!
act36side_token_recipe.name: Daily Recipe
act36side_token_recipe.usage: A daily recipe waiting to be sent to Senshi's Dungeon Diner. If it's nutritionally balanced, you'll get a prize. If you're not sure which ingredients go with which, you can ask Matterhorn, Gummy, or Hibiscus.

act37side_token_nay.description:
An emblem personally gifted by the Madam Speaker for outstanding behavior during battle or reconstruction. Anyone can use them as valuable tokens of opposition during the notice periods of the proposals deciding Londinium's future.
Note that Parliament strictly forbids the trading of this honor!
act37side_token_nay.name: 'Nay!'
act37side_token_nay.usage: Every respectable citizen has the right to oppose Parliament's public proposals, and these emblems are Parliament's acknowledgment of said right. But rumor has it that some civil servants at the Office of Proposed Resolutions will secretly trade goods for this valuable right?

act38d1_token_coin.description: A chunk of flawless Originium crystal. The Sanctuary considers it a precious treasure.
act38d1_token_coin.name: Crystalized Originium
act38d1_token_coin.usage: Reward obtained by completing Pinch-Out Experimental Operation. Can be exchanged for supplies.

act38side_token_ticket.description: The anonymous sender calls themselves 'Il Signore del Carnevale'. It is unclear if this title is a threat or in jest. The dark red soaking the paper isn't blood, but rather a fragrant wine, which seems to say that this invitation was born alongside Carnevale itself.
act38side_token_ticket.name: Invito Mistico
act38side_token_ticket.usage: Invitations handed out by an anonymous figure at Carnevale. You can exchange them for generous gifts at any Fiera delle Meraviglie Notturne. Relax, once people see the invitation, you will receive a warm welcome.

act39side_token_garum.description: Beverage made from chopped saltfin viscera and fermented with microorganisms from the underground rivers beneath the Salt Flat. The stench is both invigorating and tear-inducing. And as for its other properties... 'Has anyone told that idiota in the kitchen that you don't need to add any goddamn salt to a saltfin?!'
act39side_token_garum.name: Saltfin Garum
act39side_token_garum.usage: Both the daily drink of the pirates of the Salt Flat, and a currency they accept. So long as the fleet lacks priceless treasures such as rum, it will never be replaced.

act3bossrush_milestone_point.description: Right and wrong are far from crucial in a simulation. They are only a form of support. They help you make the correct choices when the battle is real.
act3bossrush_milestone_point.name: Trial EXP
act3bossrush_milestone_point.usage: Experience gained from finished trials. Upgrades trial levels.

act3bossrush_token_relic.description: An encrypted data block. Always remember, the conversion of information often entails unavoidable wear. Make good use of your information storage devices, but do not depend on them.
act3bossrush_token_relic.name: Data Blackbox
act3bossrush_token_relic.usage: Used to perform Data Iteration on Limiter Units.

act3collection_point_token.description: Rhodes Island issues special reward points as an incentive to field operators contributing to Integrated Strategies operations. These points can be used to redeem important supplies.
act3collection_point_token.name: 'Strategist' Point
act3collection_point_token.usage: Can be exchanged for the corresponding event stage reward.

act40side_token_yumyum.description: Fragrant meals fear not alleys deep. While invisible to the eye on most days, there is a faint aroma lining the streets, at least until it hits you face-first in front of the restaurant it leads to. You need only follow the scent of food to paint a grand picture of Baizao's streets.
act40side_token_yumyum.name: 'Yum-yum!'
act40side_token_yumyum.usage: Don't be stingy when it comes to complimenting how the food smells at Savors at Yu's. Once the Young Chef's ears go red from praise, he'll discreetly add a few extra bits of meat to your plate.

act41side_token_light.description: One tradition Tarans brought back is wearing an Originium lamp at their hips. Once, people would take them into the Dark Woods, but now those bodies have been scattered by the wind. Not even shadows are left, only shattered lamps.
act41side_token_light.name: Broken Originium Lamp
act41side_token_light.usage: A damaged Originium lamp found in the Dark Woods. Once Na Saoirs's supply issues were resolved, the citizens spontaneously decided to organize, taking out the only supplies they had on hand to recover these relics of the war.

act42side_token_pacifier.description: A pacifier soaked in saliva, with a miniature halo atop it. The child who threw it away is now wailing incessantly. Guide the way for the lost pacifier, and it will return to the child's side.
act42side_token_pacifier.name: Enlightened Pacifier
act42side_token_pacifier.usage: The enlightenment of the Shrine of Nurtury has spread like wildfire, and both the living and the unliving have sprouted halos. The first pacifiers to receive them wandered off through the Shrine in their confusion, leaving countless babes to suffer restless nights. If you are able to return them to their posts, the beleaguered nurturers will be happy to give gifts as thanks.

act43side_token_phantom.description: What is it, really? A ghost? A prop? A hallucination? Somebody's Friedkin pet? Nobody knows. Miss.Christine simply waves her twin tails as she languidly basks in the sunlight.
act43side_token_phantom.name: Phantom of the Studio
act43side_token_phantom.usage: Despite the hellish workload and a high-pressure film set, the mysterious black shadow never fails to show up every now and again, to the point that the overwhelmed crew have started to wildly speculate who is behind it. If you can trace the whereabouts of the 'Phantom of the Studio', they will be very grateful.

act4bossrush_milestone_point.description: Right and wrong are far from crucial in a simulation. They are only a form of support. They help you make the correct choices when the battle is real.
act4bossrush_milestone_point.name: Trial EXP
act4bossrush_milestone_point.usage: Experience gained from finished trials. Upgrades trial levels.

act4bossrush_token_relic.description: An encrypted data block. Always remember, the conversion of information often entails unavoidable wear. Make good use of your information storage devices, but do not depend on them.
act4bossrush_token_relic.name: Data Blackbox
act4bossrush_token_relic.usage: Used to perform Data Iteration on Limiter Units.

act4d0_intelligencepoint.description: Whether it's providing mission feedback, collecting spoils, analyzing materials, facilitating communications, or streamlining operations, Rhodes Island's efficient intelligence system continues to collect complex data from a vast array of actions and operations in order to provide the best course of action. For those unfamiliar to the mechanisms of this black box, just looking at the results will suffice.
act4d0_intelligencepoint.name: Valid Intelligence Unit
act4d0_intelligencepoint.usage: A basic unit of the Rhodes Island Intelligence Processing System, used to advance intel-gathering efforts.

act5bossrush_milestone_point.description: Right and wrong are far from crucial in a simulation. They are only a form of support. They help you make the correct choices when the battle is real.
act5bossrush_milestone_point.name: Trial EXP
act5bossrush_milestone_point.usage: Experience gained from finished trials. Upgrades trial levels.

act5bossrush_token_relic.description: An encrypted data block. Always remember, the conversion of information often entails unavoidable wear. Make good use of your information storage devices, but do not depend on them.
act5bossrush_token_relic.name: Data Blackbox
act5bossrush_token_relic.usage: Used to perform Data Iteration on Limiter Units.

act5collection_point_token.description: Rhodes Island issues special redemption points as an incentive to field operators. These points can be used to redeem important supplies.
act5collection_point_token.name: Special Redemption Point
act5collection_point_token.usage: Can be exchanged for the corresponding event stage reward.

act5d0_point_medal.description: A luxurious, but completely meaningless, golden medal created by the most esteemed goldsmiths in Lungmen. You'll be hard pressed to find anything more limited than this in all of Terra. It's clearly a cup, but still called a medal, and it symbolizes the highest praise of the Emperor. Each sip is worth a thousand bucks, but don't use it to make hot coffee!
act5d0_point_medal.name: Top Tier Penguin Medal
act5d0_point_medal.usage: Collecting medals issued by Emperor himself? Probably a good idea.

act5d1_point_conbounty.description: The ruthless but effective bounty mechanism is the only way to ensure the normal operations of the Contingency Contract system.
act5d1_point_conbounty.name: Contract Bounty
act5d1_point_conbounty.usage: Rewards earned after completing a contract. Can be used to redeem supplies.

act5d1_point_opagrt.description: The elimination of chaos does not necessarily ensure the establishment of order. 'Natural disasters turn into man-made disasters,' but the Contingency Contract system at least provides you with a solution.
act5d1_point_opagrt.name: Operation Agreement
act5d1_point_opagrt.usage: A symbol of cooperation. Can be used to unlock additional content in Contingency Contract.

act6d5_point_firecracker.description: A traditional explosive device that derives its meaning from its purpose. If an explosive goes off in a forest and no one is around to hear it, did an explosive really go off at all?
act6d5_point_firecracker.name: Quantum Firecracker
act6d5_point_firecracker.usage: The wonderful paraphernalia collected during the festival can be exchanged for great rewards.

act6d8_point_token.description: A currency that is only good in the here-and-now. The wonderful thing about tradition is that some things that appear lost to time will suddenly wake up at the most unexpected of days.
act6d8_point_token.name: Lantern Festival Treasure
act6d8_point_token.usage: The paraphernalia collected during the New Year can be exchanged for great rewards.

act7d5_point_coupon.description: The Rhodes Island Logistics Departmen issued this meal voucher during an event as an incentive to complete a series of missions. During the trial period, it will be distributed according to the number of missions completed or to operation results.
act7d5_point_coupon.name: Canteen Soup Ticket
act7d5_point_coupon.usage: A food voucher issued by the Rhodes Island Logistics Department, redeemable at the cafeteria for a limited time for a variety of special meals.

act7mini_token_permit.description: Used to prove the holder's legitimate entry credentials, as well as grant temporary right to remain. Absolutely essential when entering or exiting large nomadic cities. Some places don't check too thoroughly, but it's still best to have your papers on you.
act7mini_token_permit.name: Clearance Permit
act7mini_token_permit.usage: A customs certificate stamped with proof of border crossings from all over. Can be used to exchange for supplies at the Trading Station. Don't ask what purpose they have for taking these.

act8mini_token_vigilo.description: Others will regard these as scrawls of unclear significance; Kal'tsit speculates on the Doctor's psychological state with these; in the Doctor's eyes, these fragments have come to piece together a present self.
act8mini_token_vigilo.name: 'Imagini'
act8mini_token_vigilo.usage: Irreal images disclosed by id, cognized by ego, constructed by superego.

act9d0_token_dogTag.description: The major problem facing Kazdel's metalworking industries is that because metallic resources are mostly used for killing soldiers instead of remembering them, the rate of soldier deaths almost outpaces the ability to produce identification tags for them. This tragic scarcity has created a ripe market for perverse collectors.
act9d0_token_dogTag.name: Anonymous Tags
act9d0_token_dogTag.usage: These ID tags are generally intact, with only part of the text worn out. The Scar Market looks favorably upon this good fortune.

act9d4_point_token.name: Guerilla Squad Member Badge
act9d4_point_token.usage: These guerilla badges from the heart of Chernobog can be given to specific individuals in exchange for some rewards.

act9mini_token_ticket.description: A lottery ticket issued by a company run by a major knight noble family. Some make a fortune overnight while others go bankrupt. Within this little ticket are condensed the joys, sorrows, blood, and tears of those who resign their fate to a throw of the dice.
act9mini_token_ticket.name: Li Ticket
act9mini_token_ticket.usage: A Kazimierz Major lottery ticket bearing the logo of Pinus Sylvestris. This ticket can be exchanged at the Kazimierz Major Prize Exchange Center for corresponding prizes. Put down your chips, and win your fortune!

advanced_material_issue_voucher.description: In order to address scarcities of certain materials during processing, the Procurement Department has issued exchange vouchers for operators' discretionary use, granting access to the materials needed.
advanced_material_issue_voucher.name: Advanced Material Voucher
advanced_material_issue_voucher.usage: A special exchange voucher issued by the Rhodes Island Procurement Department. Can be used within a limited time to obtain advanced elite materials.

advanced_material_voucher_perm.description: In order to address scarcities of certain materials during processing, the Procurement Department has issued exchange vouchers for operators' discretionary use, granting access to the materials needed.
advanced_material_voucher_perm.name: Advanced Material Voucher
advanced_material_voucher_perm.usage: A special exchange voucher issued by the Rhodes Island Procurement Department. Can be used to obtain advanced elite materials.

ap_supply_lt_010.description: A low-dosage sample. To be used rationally and sensibly. If you are satisfied with this product's efficacy, you may also be interested in our other packages.
ap_supply_lt_010.name: Emergency Sanity Sampler
ap_supply_lt_010.usage: A portable, easy-to-carry sampler that is good for maintaining a level of Sanity during emergencies.

ap_supply_lt_100.description: It contains a small amount of mustard extract, so please keep it away from your eyes (other instructions omitted). When the situation is so dire that you need to use it to restore Sanity, you won't have the time to read this. Good luck!
ap_supply_lt_100.name: Top Emergency Sanity Potion
ap_supply_lt_100.usage: A large dose of emergency supplement that will swiftly clear your mind. Possible side effect: migraine.

ap_supply_lt_120.description: This product's effectiveness has been boosted to a degree thanks to modern concentrative technologies. By no means should it be used as medication. When the situation is so dire that you need it to restore Sanity, you won't have the time to read this. Good luck!
ap_supply_lt_120.name: Emergency Sanity Concentrate
ap_supply_lt_120.usage: A large dose of concentrated emergency supplement used to maintain Sanity. New active ingredients, same instant results. Possible side effect: disruption of biological clock. Please read carefully before administering.

ap_supply_lt_60.description: Although overeating can relieve the anxiety and pressure accumulated on the battlefield, it's not a healthy lifestyle, Doctor. This supplement contains quite a bit of sugar, but the packing is specially designed to be hard to open. Treat it as a kind of exercise and burn some calories.
ap_supply_lt_60.name: Emergency Sanity Potion
ap_supply_lt_60.usage: An emergency supplement used to maintain Sanity and keep your mind clear.

ap_supply_lt_80.description: Although overeating can relieve the anxiety and pressure accumulated on the battlefield, it's not a healthy lifestyle, Doctor. This supplement contains quite a bit of sugar, but the packing is specially designed to be hard to open. Treat it as a kind of exercise and burn some calories.
ap_supply_lt_80.name: Emergency Sanity Booster
ap_supply_lt_80.usage: An emergency supplement with lightly increased dosage, used to maintain Sanity. Keep your mind clear and drive out fatigue.

base_ap.description: Drones used for construction. They are controlled by the Rhodes Island Logistics Department. Without them, Operators would have to wait 10 times as long to get base housing.
base_ap.name: Drone
base_ap.usage: A machine that is important for the Base construction of Rhodes Island. Can be used to clean, construct, and upgrade base facilities.

bilibili001.description: Who will it be? Can't wait!
bilibili001.name: Preregister to get 1 of 4 Operators randomly

classic_gacha.description: Rhodes Island's expansion is inseparable from the help and support it has received from kernel personnel. This headhunting item will assist the Doctor in recruiting talent within specified bounds.
classic_gacha.name: Kernel Headhunting Permit
classic_gacha.usage: A special permit from Rhodes Island's HR distribution for recruiting a single kernel talent.

classic_gacha_10.description: Rhodes Island's expansion is inseparable from the help and support it has received from kernel personnel. These headhunting items will assist the Doctor in recruiting talent within specified bounds.
classic_gacha_10.name: Ten-roll Kernel Headhunting Permit
classic_gacha_10.usage: A special permit from Rhodes Island HR distribution for recruiting multiple kernel talents. Can be used to recruit ten operators.

classic_normal_ticket.description: Time has allowed these operators to gain a deep understanding of Rhodes Island's affairs. They will provide you the rare resources you need.
classic_normal_ticket.name: Universal Certificates
classic_normal_ticket.usage: A certificate that attests an operator possesses core abilities. Can be exchanged for rare materials.

emoticon_originium_slug.description: 'Stop pulling up the corners of your mouth into that stiff smile and try being more like an Originium slug. Open up your shell, spread out your soft parts, and... Believe me, do that, and you'll get over the awkwardness real quick.'
emoticon_originium_slug.name: Emote Set: Slug Style
emoticon_originium_slug.usage: An emote set based on Originium slugs, used to communicate between partners.

et_ObsidianPass.description: A through ticket system has been implemented across the various venues at this Obsidian Festival, which means tickets are required for most events. So please make good use of the tickets you have!
et_ObsidianPass.name: Obsidian Festival Ticket
et_ObsidianPass.usage: A ticket to the Obsidian Festival. Can be used to enter special stages.

favor_add_ulika.description: A storage device with recordings of the most wonderful livestream moments, and can be used to raise the trust of U-Official.
favor_add_ulika.name: Streamer U's Stream Clips

itempack_gacha_1.description: A gift bag obtained during the Roka Village's special prayer event, containing well wishes that will guide you toward a merry future.
itempack_gacha_1.name: Bounteous Fortunes Gift Bag
itempack_gacha_1.usage: Obtain 'Collaboration Limited Ten-roll Headhunting Permit' and avatar 'Soubo Impressions.' 'Collaboration Limited Ten-roll Headhunting Permit' expires 09/21/2023 03:59

itempack_gold_1.description: Exusiai suddenly remembered her promise to exchange those medals today. After checking the number of 'Best Boss' medals you have, she skirted around the old rules and gave you this one.
itempack_gold_1.name: Super! Best! Boss Medal
itempack_gold_1.usage: Looks to be made from expensive metals, and can be exchanged for LMD.

itempack_main_1.description: A materials supply crate issued alongside Sanity samplers, giving you a random material as you restore your Sanity.
itempack_main_1.name: Rhodes Island Supply Crate
itempack_main_1.usage: Contains an Emergency Sanity Sampler and some Rhodes Island Supplies.

itempack_mod_10.description: Faced with the issue of insufficient training data, the Engineering Department has produced an all-new chip etching apparatus to provide Operators with a self-printing service.
itempack_mod_10.name: Sniper Chip Pack Etcher
itempack_mod_10.usage: A disposable chip pack etching apparatus, storing large quantities of training records and data. Can print chip packs hassle-free, in accordance with Sniper Operators' needs.

itempack_mod_11.description: Faced with the issue of insufficient training data, the Engineering Department has produced an all-new chip etching apparatus to provide Operators with a self-printing service.
itempack_mod_11.name: Caster Chip Pack Etcher
itempack_mod_11.usage: A disposable chip pack etching apparatus, storing large quantities of training records and data. Can print chip packs hassle-free, in accordance with Caster Operators' needs.

itempack_mod_4.description: Fruit of the blood and sweat of our colleagues in Engineering, this data chunk includes the data and information to meet an Operator Module's foundational requirements.
itempack_mod_4.name: Integrated Module Data Chunk
itempack_mod_4.usage: Contains items for unlocking and upgrading Operator Modules.

itempack_mod_6.description: Fruit of the blood and sweat of our colleagues in Engineering, this data box stockpiles a ridiculous amount of data, able to meet an Operator Module's requirements on all fronts at once.
itempack_mod_6.name: Integrated Module Data Box
itempack_mod_6.usage: Contains items for unlocking and upgrading Operator Modules.

itempack_mod_7.description: Faced with the issue of insufficient training data, the Engineering Department has produced an all-new chip etching apparatus to provide Operators with a self-printing service.
itempack_mod_7.name: Vanguard Chip Pack Etcher
itempack_mod_7.usage: A disposable chip pack etching apparatus, storing large quantities of training records and data. Can etch chip packs hassle-free, in accordance with Vanguard Operators' needs.

itempack_mod_8.description: Faced with the issue of insufficient training data, the Engineering Department has produced an all-new chip etching apparatus to provide Operators with a self-printing service.

mcardVoucher.description: With an eye to negotiability and convenience, several new permits have risen to the task, and this just so happens to be one of them.
mcardVoucher.name: Monthly Card Exchange Permit
mcardVoucher.usage: Enables activation of Monthly Card privileges.

mod_unlock_token.description: The data blocks record the endless nights the Engineering Department toiled away developing the various modules.
mod_unlock_token.name: Module Data Block

mod_update_token_1.description:
Experience is abstracted into data, and the data become a weapon. All true warriors must come to know both themselves and the battlefield.
The crystallization of the entire Engineering Department's blood, sweat, and tears. Once upgraded, the modules will greatly improve our Operators' combat abilities.
mod_update_token_1.name: Data Supplement Stick

mod_update_token_2.description:
Experience is abstracted into data, and the data become a weapon. All true warriors must come to know both themselves and the battlefield.
The crystallization of the entire Engineering Department's blood, sweat, and tears. Once further upgraded, the modules will help optimize our Operators' combat styles and vastly improve their abilities.
mod_update_token_2.name: Data Supplement Instrument

premium_material_issue_voucher.description: In order to address scarcities of certain materials during processing, the Procurement Department has issued exchange vouchers for operators' discretionary use, granting access to the materials needed.
premium_material_issue_voucher.name: Premium Material Voucher
premium_material_issue_voucher.usage: A special exchange voucher issued by the Rhodes Island Procurement Department. Can be used within a limited time to obtain premium elite materials.

premium_material_voucher_perm.usage: A special exchange voucher issued by the Rhodes Island Procurement Department. Can be used to obtain premium elite materials.

randomDiamondShd_1.description: Nobody knows who ended up footing the bill. What we do know is the hope they have for Rhodes Island.
randomDiamondShd_1.name: Half Year Anniversary Red Envelope
randomDiamondShd_1.usage: Red envelopes passed out to every member of Rhodes Island. The goods inside may be random, but they are always filled to the brim with blessings.

randomDiamondShd_2.description: Nobody knows who ended up footing the bill. What we do know is the hope they have for Rhodes Island.
randomDiamondShd_2.name: Celebratory Box
randomDiamondShd_2.usage: Gift boxes distributed to all members of Rhodes Island, random in amount, and full of the joy that comes with celebration.

randomMaterialRune_0.description: A supply crate from the Contingency Contract network. Provides a bit of a reward to those who work hard to heal this land. -Contingency Contract
randomMaterialRune_0.name: Operation Barrenland Supplies
randomMaterialRune_0.usage: Filled with an assortment of supplies and materials.

randomMaterial_1.name: Rhodes Island Supplies
randomMaterial_1.usage: Filled with an assortment of supplies and materials.

randomMaterial_2.description: Lanterns hung up during the passing of the old year and the arrival of the new. Within them are recent memories, puzzles and riddles, and even tales from the distant past.
randomMaterial_2.name: New Year's Lantern
randomMaterial_2.usage: A collection of supplies and materials collected through the New Year.

randomMaterial_3.description: A pack of rations containing various resources and supplies. In more ways than one, its appearance provides glimpses into the battle that transpired in the heart of Chernobog. Even looking at it now fills one's heart with a lingering dread.
randomMaterial_3.name: 32-hour Strategic Ration
randomMaterial_3.usage: A pack of rations, containing a variety of random supplies.

randomMaterial_9.name: Rhodes Island Supplies VI
randomMaterial_9.usage: Filled with an assortment of supplies and materials.

randomMaterial_act38side.description: Carnival Canisters specially made by the Commissione di Fuochi d'Artificio for Carnevale, also usable to wrap presents. There is a very small chance of it exploding when opening. Treat it as a surprise gift.
randomMaterial_act38side.name: Carnival Canister
randomMaterial_act38side.usage: Contains various supplies that can be used during Carnevale, including random materials.

randomMaterial_act42side.description: 'Waste material' is a foreign concept to Paganini's workshop. Any excess from the gun manufacturing process will be processed by his apprentice Vannini into little trinkets to be given as gifts to clients.
randomMaterial_act42side.name: Firearms Workshop Giftbox
randomMaterial_act42side.usage: Contains various supplies from the firearms workshop, including random materials.

randomMaterial_leith2.description: 'Though the contents are as unalike as the sounds of the heart, they will help you in your search for the truth. Follow the echoes not yet forgotten, and you will eventually find the answer.'
randomMaterial_leith2.name: Investigation Resupply
randomMaterial_leith2.usage: Package from an unknown source containing various supplies, including random materials.

randomMaterial_rhine2.description: A materials supply crate provided by the Maylander Foundation. Allocated based on the needs of each investigated area. As such, the materials in each crate can be different.
randomMaterial_rhine2.name: Technological Investigation Supply
randomMaterial_rhine2.usage: Filled with an assortment of supplies and materials.

randomMaterial_siesta2.description: A material resupply box from Mountaincomm Trade. We the vendor are delighted to work with such a major client, and offer these complimentary gifts to you courtesy of our partner logistics firm.
randomMaterial_siesta2.name: Mountaincomm Trade Supplies
randomMaterial_siesta2.usage: Filled with an assortment of supplies and materials.

return_credit_token.description: An emblem specially prepared for those returning to major posts. Granted progressively throughout the course of their familiarization with work.
return_credit_token.name: Second Authentication Emblem
return_credit_token.usage: An emblem of special authentication distributed internally within Rhodes Island. Collect a certain amount to obtain partial usage rights to Rhodes Island's supplies.

return_credit_token2.description: An emblem specially prepared for those returning to major posts. Granted progressively throughout the course of their familiarization with work.
return_credit_token2.name: Second Authentication Emblem
return_credit_token2.usage: An emblem of special authentication distributed internally within Rhodes Island. Collect a certain amount to obtain partial usage rights to Rhodes Island's supplies.

sandbox_1_tokencoin.description: Each bead of sweat shed upon the barren ground will one day bear witness to the prospering of Terran civilization.
sandbox_1_tokencoin.name: Prosperity Point
sandbox_1_tokencoin.usage: A voucher that can be exchanged for rewards at 'Expansional Rewards'.

so_char_exp_1.description:
Special Operators do battle in extremely complex environments with highly dynamic conditions, and recording them is equally difficult. But if it ends up helping out in some future battle, it will all be worth it.
This collection comes with a special 'Interesting Highlights' page.
so_char_exp_1.name: Special Operator Battle Record
so_char_exp_1.usage: A device that stores battle videos of Special Operators. Gives Special Operators a certain amount of EXP.

token_Obsidian.description: Just collect them regardless of what they can do. Surely the marketing department will find some use for them.
token_Obsidian.name: Siesta Obsidian
token_Obsidian.usage: Obsidian crystal mined from Siesta. Can be used to redeem rewards.

token_ObsidianCoin.description: The demand from Obsidian Festival participants is so exceedingly high that they have yet to be met even after repeated reward restocking. Unfortunately, stopping the raffle at this time would mean triggering a riot, so the hosts have to keep the raffle going.
token_ObsidianCoin.name: Obsidian Festival Token
token_ObsidianCoin.usage: Official token for the Obsidian Festival raffle event. Can be used to draw rewards.

token_Wristband.description: The bracelets are costly to make, so we are not gonna let them just get thrown away!
token_Wristband.name: Obsidian Festival Bracelet
token_Wristband.usage: Recyclable entry identification bracelet for the Obsidian Festival. Can be used to redeem rewards.
